definitions.title: 1. m.
definitions.body: a king of Moab, Ju Jdg 3:12, Jdg 3:14, Jdg 3:15, Jdg 3:17, Jdg 3:17, LXX Eglwm.

definitions.title: loc.
definitions.body: Jos 10:3, Jos 10:5, Jos 10:23, Jos 10:37, Jos 12:12, Jos 15:34, c. [[ה]] loc. Jos 10:34, [[מֵעֶגְלוֹ֫נׇה]] v:Jos 10:36; LXX Odollam Jos 10; Ailam Jos 12:12, A Eglwm, LXX Eglwn, and so Jos 15:39; site ‘Aǧlân, N. of Tele-el-Ḥesy, Buhl:Geogr. 192.
